# Ranseur
## Overview
Similar in appearance to a trident, a ranseur has a single spear at its tip, flanked by a pair of short, curving blades.


-tx-

| | **Two-Handed Melee Weapon** | **Cost** | **Dmg (S)** | **Dmg (M)** | **Critical** | **Range Increment** | **Weight** | **Type** | ** Special** |
| | Ranseur | 10 gp | 1d6 | 2d4 | x3 | â€” | xx lbs. | P | disarm, reach |

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 148
